resources.string: Same WhatsApp number in multiple names
To delete selected duplicate(s) press the delete icon. The original(master) value for each duplicate is not selected and will not be deleted.

Choose the criterion for identifying duplicates. Duplicates along with their original(master) value will be displayed in main screen and will be auto-checked for deletion. Original(master) value is not checked.
Use the duplicate icon in top-right to set view option for duplicates
It is recommended that you backup your contacts before deleting them
